settings.heading: International Shipping
settings.content: We ship within North America (Continental United States and Canada)

settings.heading: Complementary Shipping
settings.content: We offer complementary shipping on orders above $75 dollars. All orders that are free shipped come with tracking.

settings.heading: Online Order Fulfilment
settings.content:
If the order is received before 12:00 pm ET, it is usually packed and prepared to be shipped at the same day the order is placed. The rest of the orders are fulfilled by the next business day.  

Local Delivery 

You can pick up your order after reciving a " Ready for Pickup" notification from our flagship boutique in Bayview Village Shopping Center. 
A local pick up confirmation form has to be completed by the customer. 
For picking up your order you must have a valid photo ID.

settings.heading: Shipping Rates
settings.content:
We ship all the orders above $75 dollars for free by FEDEX. 

-   Orders under $75 Continental United States: $20 flat rate (Expedited shipping - With Tracking)
-   Orders under $75 Canada: $15 flat rate (Expedited shipping - With Tracking)
-   FEDEX Expedited (2 business days) Canada: $45 Flat Rate (UPS Expedited With Tracking)
